instructions: Connect your device to your Mac. You can connect your device using a USB or USB-C cable or using a Wi-Fi connection. To turn on Wi-Fi syncing, see Sync content between your Mac and iPhone or iPad over Wi-Fi . In the Finder on your Mac, select the device in the Finder sidebar. Select Audiobooks in the button bar. Select the Sync audiobooks onto [ device name ] checkbox to turn on syncing of your audiobooks. With the checkbox selected, syncing is set to transfer all your audiobooks to your device. To sync a selection of audiobooks, click Selected audiobooks. Select the checkboxes for the individual audiobooks you want to sync in the Audiobooks list. Deselect the checkbox for any audiobooks you don t want to sync. When you re ready to sync, click Apply.
